AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Canoptek Spyder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Canoptek Spyders are massive robotic Necron constructs, all Canoptek Spyders have a Fabricator Claw Array that allows them to effect repairs on a Necron tomb’s systems, and these also make for frighteningly destructive weapons. Canoptek Spyders also sometimes sport additional weaponry to better repel crypt intruders.
